heading: HB02291
0: AN ACT REQUIRING SUPERMARKETS, MEAT SHOPS AND PUBLIC AND PRIVATE MARKETS IN METROPOLITAN AND URBAN AREAS AND SUCH AREAS WITH SIGNIFICANT MUSLIM POPULATION IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY, TO SEGREGATE NON-PORK MEAT PRODUCTS FROM PORK PRODUCTS AND ITS DERIVATIVES OR ANY PRODUCT CONTAINING PORK OR ANY OF ITS DERIVATIVES
status: Pending with the Committee on MUSLIM AFFAIRS since 2019-07-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02291
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING SUPERMARKETS, MEAT SHOPS AND PUBLIC AND PRIVATE MARKETS IN METROPOLITAN AND URBAN AREAS AND SUCH AREAS WITH SIGNIFICANT MUSLIM POPULATION IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY, TO SEGREGATE NON-PORK MEAT PRODUCTS FROM PORK PRODUCTS AND ITS DERIVATIVES OR ANY PRODUCT CONTAINING PORK OR ANY OF ITS DERIVATIVES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DIMAPORO, MOHAMAD KHALID Q.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-17
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Savellano (000 2019-11-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON MUSLIM AFFAIRS ON 2019-07-29
